traits.name: Aura of Terror
entries: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition are immune to this trait.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

actions.name: Mace
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 14 (4d6 damage) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The black gauntlet is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
